website_summaries.verdict: This pressure washer delivers a lot more power than other electric power washers at this price point.
pros: Easy to put together and to use
Small enough to be easy to store
Does a good job on mildew
Wheels and telescoping handle help make it easy to move around
cons: A little heavier than some of the other power washers under $200

customer_reviews.title: Strong and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Compared to gas pressure sprayers, this thing is a dream. I went through two gas sprayers in four years, (around $275 ea), before I saw the write up on this one. It is compact, the hose and A/C cord rolls up easily and it is easy to wheel around. No water leaks, well made, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: wayarm

customer_reviews.title: It's the best electric power washer I've ever had!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned three previous power washers, 1 gas and 2 electric, and this one is my favorite. It has enough power to wash your house siding, motocross bikes, cars, you name it, it does a great job. Especially like the soap dispenser. Just load the soap of your choice, lather the car, and rinse. My family loves it. All the different attachment heads can accomplish whatever your needs are. When you first hear it run or carry the unit you will notice the quality. Not something cheap like you find at your local discount store. The colors to choose from are also attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Trailhand

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: My previous experience with pressure washers prior to this one was very limited. After received this pressure washer as soon as I got it, I started using it. It was very easy to put together. The unit is very light and easy to move around. For normal household uses, this one will work great. We used it to power off the moss, clean my driveway, my car, house, and garage. In fact, very good cleaning the bricks of my garage. I feel like this has enough power to handle these jobs well, with the right price. Easy to carry, easy to use and the motor is very quieter. Thumbs up! I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mucio DPJ

customer_reviews.title: Good surprise
customer_reviews.text: Overall the product is great, it fullfiled all my expectations! I bought the unit mainly for small works like: washing my car, cleaning my barbecue and washing the driveway. So far it is getting the work done. Pros: The pressure is amanzily strong for an electric pressure washer! Portible, not a big product. Good veiaty of accessories. Easy setup. Cons: Quite havye (the wheels will help). To be honest that is the only con so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This has not worked right since the first day it shuts off for no apparent reason
customer_reviews.text: The power will come on 50% of the time and it takes a while to get it to power up turning the switch on and off repeatedly, when it powers up it works well for cleaning my car which is what I bought this product to do. beware I left in the garage this winter and the connection to the sprayer just cracked and fell a part because its molded plastic threads off the spray gun and now I need a replacement hose because we can't remove the plastic inside hose connector."Nothing but Problems now using my gas Power washer after buying this last August.
customer_reviews.author: ALC

customer_reviews.title: good pressure
customer_reviews.text: only used it once, but I was very impressed with how strong it was for an electric. Good price,
customer_reviews.author: dmbox

customer_reviews.title: Impressed by the quality!
customer_reviews.text: By far one of the best Power Pressure Washers I've ever used! I was a little hesitant at first considering the low price; but I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the product and have already recommended it to many of my friends. I recently hosted a party in my backyard and I thought my light colored pavement was ruined, however, with this pressure washer it was a matter of minutes before I was able to make the house brand new again. It's as if the Superbowl party we hosted outside never happened! I definitely recommend this product to anyone who wants a quick and easy way to keep their house looking brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Marcella

customer_reviews.title: The best Pressure Washer
customer_reviews.text: I received my Power Pressure Washer 2200 and was very pleased and really impressed with the quality of the product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not last...
customer_reviews.text: Unboxed and used with ease. Approximately 4 uses later it just wouldn’t start correctly or stay on. Very disappointed as it worked great the first time and when I needed it periodically over a 6 month time period. Looking for my warranty info now. :(
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Turner

customer_reviews.title: Washed Dirty Driveway
customer_reviews.text: Needed washer to clean very dirty driveway to get off hook with HOA. Handled project with no problem. Liked the option of selecting different washer heads. 4 stars because a bit unwieldy to roll
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Travis C. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Bought a second one we liked it so much!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift so I can't comment on it but I will say it was delivered promptly and my husband has the exact pressure washer and we loved it so much we ordered another for a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Karon E.

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Decks Damaged from Salty Beach Air
customer_reviews.text: The 2200 psi electric power washer beautifully cleaned our decks damaged from salty beach air. We also used on RV and car. The various nozzles help to modify spray and intensity.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Garrison

customer_reviews.title: For the and the power is a great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I didn't expect the power. Fast delivery, fast to assenble and a lot of power. I Pressured washed my patio with the yellow Spray Tip. EXCELLENT!!! More than what I expected. I strongly recommend this product. Better then very expensive gas machines for basicly the same result.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Lupo

customer_reviews.title: Worked maybe 3 times
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this washer MAYBE 5 times and it already will not build pressure at all. It just hums a few seconds and stops. No pressure build up
customer_reviews.author: Wangspeed

customer_reviews.title: Great pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: This pressure washer is the best pressure washer I have ever owned (granted this is my 2nd pressure washer). Unlike my last pressure washer, this one has the Water Hose Inlet on the front of the washer which makes it easier to roll. It is quieter than my last pressure washer as well. The motor quiets itself if the trigger is not engaged. This feature is great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael White

customer_reviews.title: Overall great purchase
customer_reviews.text: As a very picky buyer, I do recommend this product. It's a great pressure washer. Isn't crazy powerful but good for normal home use and multiple cleaning purposes.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived fast and on time for preparations before Holidays. This equipment is very powerful and lightweight after set up. It is so easy to use that I did the job by myself and didn't wait for my husband, in few hours I was able to clean the front and back pavers of my house. I really recommend the Power Pressure Washer 2200 from VMInnovations.
customer_reviews.author: Grios

customer_reviews.title: High quality unit that is multi-functional due to the sprayer heads.
customer_reviews.text: I use it to power wash my boat and driveway, which it does easily, except the cord could be longer. I had to use an extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: Dex

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power!
customer_reviews.text: This pressure washer is fantastic! Not having to deal with gas, oil, and all that comes with it makes this the best pressure washer I have ever used. It’s small, lightweight, and very powerful. It’s also nice not to have to listen to an engine running the entire time. Great product, and highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Reichwein

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I really like the compact and sleek design. I used it on pool pavers and it worked great. Its also nice that it only makes noise when you are spraying (I'm sure the neighbors appreciate that too).
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great unit.  Works lije it shoukd and is quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Unit works well. I use it for equipment cleaning and car washing. It's nice and quiet but powerful enough to blast bugs and grease off.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon S.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great electric feature. Perfect for small jobs around the house.
customer_reviews.author: thomas kane

customer_reviews.title: Portable and efficient
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with this machine because it is lightweight, easy to use and has very good pressure! I recommend this pressure washer.
customer_reviews.author: Fabio

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome electric power washer
customer_reviews.text: If you looking for a quiet and powerful machine. you got it. simple and easy to use. very good
customer_reviews.author: Quitiana Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!!!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research when it came down to getting a electric pressure washer and hands down this thing did not disappoint. I would recommend this pressure washer to anyone! I bought for my car detailing, pool deck and sidewalk. Strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Brodella

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Pressure Washer !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Power Pressure, the first one I am using in my home, the second one it’s for my business, this product is perfect, I definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Edmar Aranda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This pressure washer is fantastic! I've used a gas fed pressure washer for years, the gas fed ones are so big and bulky, this electric unit is so easy to handle, it even has an extending handle like a suitcase to make it easier to move around. There is very little assembly required, it's easier to put together than a new vacuum cleaner. The 2200 PSI is perfect for washing the cars, driveway, and the pool deck. I've even used it on the house to wash away that Florida mildew. It's a great little unit!
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Not a brand new product.
customer_reviews.text: Order new but came out used and have some broken part.
customer_reviews.author: Huy

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: I loved that it was so easy to put together and use. I finally got all the ick off my house from Irma. Also took the mud bug nests right off.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Mason

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t turn on!
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t turn on....ordered another one but if this one doesn’t work either then it’s crap for all that money
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Top
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for cleaning the garage flooring. It is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: C. M

product_meta.title: POWER Pressure Washer NXG-2200 PSI 1.76 GPM Electric 14.5Amp BRUSHLESS Induction Technology | The Next Generation of Pressure Washer | 4X More Lifespan | Ultra Low Sound | New Design (Blue)
product_meta.description: Color:BluePOWER Pressure Washer 2200 PSI 1.76 GPM Electric 14.5Amp BRUSHLESS Induction Technology | The Next Generation of Pressure Washer | 4X More Lifespan | Ultra Low Sound | New Design ( Blue)
feature_bullets: 2019 NEW HIGH-TECH INDUCTION MOTOR: Guaranteed the best product in the market, made with the best latest technology and design. You will acquire an induction motor power washer up to 2200 PSI for the same price of the old brushed motor pressure washer. That is true! A much better product for the same amount of money. GUARANTEED! Besides, our Power Pressure Washer comes in a completely new design never seen before. Beautiful, Powerful, Portable: Just Perfect for the job!

POWER EFFICIENCY & 4 TIMES MORE LIFESPAN: Induction motors generate less heat and require less current to generate higher power than universal (brushed) motors. This is another reason why our Power Pressure Washer is by far the best product in the market. In addition, the induction technology gives the product 4 times more lifespan! And you will NOT pay more for that!

IMPORTANT FEATURES: The next generation of power washers come with a 30ft long power cord and 20ft long hose. It also includes a soap dispenser (not built in, tough). This pressure washer is equipped with a micro switch sensitive to water flow. This Total Stop System (TSS) senses water flow in the pump. When the trigger is released, water stops flowing through the pump. The TSS then automatically turns the motor off to protect the pump from overheating.

VERY LOW SOUND LEVEL: Universal motors run at very high speeds and are loud. An induction motor pressure washer twice as powerful as a universal powered machine will still be quieter. You want to use your power washer any time without having problems with your neighbors, right? Another very good reason for you to buy the new 2018 Power Pressure Washer 2200 PSI Electric - The Next Generation of Pressure Washer.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED OR YOUR MONEY BACK: for us, it is straight forward: if you, by any chance, do not like our products, please feel free to return them and we will refund you. You can do that anytime and we promise no hassle at all. We want your purchase experience with us to be as smooth as possible. No questions asked.
